import React from 'react'; import {connect} from 'react-redux' //connects component to redux import {Link} from 'react-router-dom' import './header.style.scss'; import {auth} from '../../firebase/firebase' import {ReactComponent as Logo} from '../../assets/crown.svg'//import svg as a component const Header=({currentUser})=>(
SHOP CONTACT { currentUser?
auth.signOut()}>SIGN OUT
: SIGN IN }
) export default connect()(Header)
